numlitem.para: Autopilot with altitude hold, and altitude capture is operative,
En route operations, ie RVSM, do not require its use,
Aircraft does not depart from a designated airport (SDF) where repair or replacement can be made, and
Repairs are made within 3 flight days.
In addition to normal crew callouts, the crew will observe and acknowledge Altitude Capture and Altitude Hold Flight Mode Annunciation on EADI.
Modify the FAA filing suffix to the appropriate code.

placard.para: Placard above Captain’s Marker Beacon Lights "ALERT LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
